TEXT.English: [H1]HEALTH[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategy:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Health[COLOR_REVERT] is an important factor for the achievements of each individual colony. Once a colony grows beyond a certain size, the population will generate negative health, which results in lower productivity of all colonists.[PARAGRAPH:1]This can be countered by putting colonists to work as [LINK=PROFESSION_HEALER]Healers[\LINK] in the [LINK=BUILDING_MEDICAL_OFFICE]Medical Office[\LINK] or one of its upgrades, who generate positive Health, which results in higher productivity for all colonists. Positive Health is generated twice as fast if a [LINK=UNIT_DOCTOR]Renowned Medic[\LINK] works as a Healer. Additionally, the [LINK=BUILDING_VILLAGE_WELL]Village Well[\LINK] generates positive Health as well.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_HEALTH]Health and Medical Care[\LINK][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Medical care improves healthiness of the citizens in the colonies. The higher the population of a city gets, the more it will suffer from diseases and problems resulting from hygenical situation through wastes or polution from factories. During the times of the colonization of the New World, medicine and sanitation systems were still not very advanced. In the New World even less than in Europe. But with increasing wealth and size of the colonies and also of course scientific advances this situation improved over the decades. More and more doctors settled down in villages in especially the cities and hospitals, sewers and other sanitary systems were established. This again affected positivley productivity and growth of the colonies.

TEXT.German: [H1]Gesundheit[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Strategie:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gesundheit[COLOR_REVERT] ist ein sehr wichtiger Faktor für den Erfolg einer Kolonie. Je größer die Bevölkerung einer Kolonie wird, desto negativer wirkt sich dies auf die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gesundheit[COLOR_REVERT] der Bevölkerung aus. Dies wiederum senkt die Produktivität.[PARAGRAPH:1]Diesem Effekt kann entgegengewirkt werden, indem man Kolonisten als [LINK=PROFESSION_HEALER]Heiler[\LINK] in einer [LINK=BUILDING_MEDICAL_OFFICE]Arztpraxis[\LINK] oder deren Ausbaustufen arbeiten lässt. Dieser erhöht dann die Gesundheit der Kolonie wodurch die Produktivität wieder gesteigert wir. Ein [LINK=UNIT_DOCTOR]Ausgebildeter Arzt[\LINK] ist darin doppelt so effektiv. Ein [LINK=BUILDING_VILLAGE_WELL]Dorfbrunnen[\LINK] wirkt sich ebenfalls positiv auf die Gesundheit der Kolonie aus. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Für weitere Informationen siehe [LINK=CONCEPT_HEALTH]Gesundheit und Medizinische Versorgung[\LINK][PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Hintergrund:[\BOLD][NEWLINE]Wo immer eine große Anzahl von Menschen zusammenkommt, da sind Unrat, Krankheiten und sogar Seuchen nicht weit. Zur Zeit der Kolonialisierung der Neuen Welt steckte die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Medizin[COLOR_REVERT] noch in den Kinderschuhen. Fragwürdige Praktiken zur Heilung schlecht oder noch gar nicht erforschter [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Krankheiten[COLOR_REVERT] waren an der Tagesordnung. Da Hygiene zur damaligen Zeit in weiten Teilen der Bevölkerung noch unbekannt war sowie deren Wechselwirkung mit verheerenden Krankheiten, kam es insbesondere in den immer größer werdenden Städten immer wieder zu Seuchen mit ungezählten Toten. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heilkräuter und erste Formen von Medizin [COLOR_REVERT] - verbunden mit einer frühen Form der medizinischen Forschung sowie immer mehr [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ärzte und Heiler[COLOR_REVERT] förderten den allgemeinen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gesundheitszustand[COLOR_REVERT] der Bevölkerung jedoch zusehends. Krankenhäuser - zu jener Zeit oft nicht mehr als ein düsterer Ort zum Sterben - halfen mit, infizierte Menschen zu isolieren und Krankheiten einzudämmen. Ärzte konnten verstärkt "am lebenden Objekt" forschen - und taten dies auch zur Genüge. Trotzdem sind derartige Einrichtungen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]in Städten einer bestimmten Größe [COLOR_REVERT] einfach unverzichtbar. Eine Arztpraxis bietet i.d.R. zumindest einen Behandlungsraum und einen überschaubaren Vorrat an Heilmitteln.
TEXT.Italian: Medical care improves healthiness of the citizens in the colonies. The higher the population of a city gets, the more it will suffer from diseases and problems resulting from hygenical situation through wastes or polution from factories. During the times of the colonization of the New World, medicine and saniation systems were still not very advanced. In the New World even less than in Europe. But with increasing wealth and size of the colonies and also of course scientific advances this situation improved over the decades. More and more doctors settled down in villages in especially the cities and hospitals, sewers and other sanitary systems were established. This again affected positivly productivity and growth of the colonies.

TEXT.English: During the times of the colonization of the New World almost all artificial wells were pumpless hand-dug wells. They were a very important source of water in some rural developing areas where they were routinely dug and used. Clean water was and still is essential for health and generally survival. [PARAGRAPH:1]Hand-dug wells are excavations with diameters large enough to accommodate one or more persons with shovels digging down to below the water table. They can be lined with laid stones or brick, extending this lining upwards above the ground surface to form a wall around the well serves to reduce both contamination and injuries by falling into the well.

TEXT.German: Während der Zeit der Kolonisierung der Neuen Welt waren fast alle künstlichen Brummen handgegraben und ohne Pumpsystem. Sie waren eine sehr wichtige Quelle für Wasser, vorallem in den ländlichen Gegenden, wo Brunnen dieser Art routinemässig gegraben wurden. Sauberes Wasser war und ist essentiell für die Gesundheit der Menschen und allgemein für ihr Leben. [PARAGRAPH:1]Handgegrabenen Brunnen sind Grabungen, die tief genug in die Erde reichen um unter den Wasserspiegel im Boden zu gelangen. Sie können mit Steinen oder Ziegel ausgelegt sein, die normalerweise bis über den Obergrund reichen. Dies verhindert sowohl Verschmutzung des Wassers, wie auch Verletzungen durch einen Sturz in den Brunnen.

TEXT.English: Medical doctors and surgeons in the days of the colonization of the New World were most often found in armies. Medical offices or even hospitals were quite rare and mostly only to be found in very big cities or at courts of rich aristocrats. However, there were healers that were wandering around and although often hardly educated still provided some basic medical care to rural villages and smaller cities. However, as the decades passed, urban populations grew and medical science advanced, more and more medical offices and hospitals were established in the cities to fight diseases and unhealthiness caused by waste and pollution from huge populations living on a small area. Even though many healers were still more or less uneducated more and more medical doctors also came out of renowned Schools and Universities.
TEXT.French: Medical doctors and surgeons in the days of the colonization of the New World were most often found in armies. Medical offices or even hospitals were quite rare and mostly only to be found in very big cities or at courts of rich aristocrats. However, there were healers that were wandering around and although often hardly educated still provided some basic medical care to rural villages and smaller cities. However, as the decades passed, urban populations grew and medical science advanced, more and more medical offices and hospitals were established in the cities to fight diseases and unhealthiness caused by waste and pollution from huge populations living on a small area. Even though many healers were still more or less uneducated more and more medical doctors also came out of renowned Schools and Universities.
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ärzte[COLOR_REVERT] waren zur damaligen Zeit vor allem dort anzutreffen, wo es am meisten Arbeit für sie gab, so z. B. beim Militär, wo sie Wundarzt oder Feldscher genannt wurden. Es gab jedoch auch immer mehr Ärzte und Heiler, die - ähnlich wie heute - in größeren Ansiedlungen eigene Praxen betrieben oder als Wanderärzte durch die Lande zogen. Auch bei Hofe waren Ärzte zur persönlichen Betreuung bessergestellter Persönlichkeiten angestellt. Ärzte waren bei allerlei Krankheiten wichtige Anlaufstellen für die Bevölkerung.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ärzte hatten in der Regel eine handwerkliche Ausbildung, sprich eine Handwerkslehre bei einem Bader oder Barbier, mit abschließender Gesellenprüfung, absolviert. Um die Ausbildung und Ausübung der Wundheilkunde qualitativ sicherzustellen und sich vor Missbrauch und Scharlatanerie zu schützen, wurden Berufsordnungen erlassen, die die Tätigkeit der Ärzte regelten. Ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Heiler[COLOR_REVERT] ist meist weniger oder gar nicht ausgebildet, sondern übt seine Tätigkeit aufgrund eigener Erfahrungen mit bestimmten Heilkräutern und Heilmethoden aus. Bestimmte Verrichtungen durften beispielsweise nur unter Aufsicht oder nach Anweisung eines gelehrten Arztes vorgenommen werden.

TEXT.English: The bigger the population of a city gets the higher the risk of diseases spreading and the more waste and polution. This will negative affect the health and productivity of the citizens. To counter that effect medical care needs to be provided. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Medical Offices[COLOR_REVERT] are the basic level of buildings to allow citizens to work as [LINK=PROFESSION_HEALER]Healers[\LINK], producing [LINK=YIELD_HEALTH]Health[\LINK] for the colony. [LINK=UNIT_DOCTOR]Renowned Medics[\LINK] are most proficient in this profession. Health production can further be increased through building a [LINK=BUILDING_VILLAGE_WELL]Village Well[\LINK], or upgrading this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_HOSPITAL]Town Hospital[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_HEALTH]Health and Medical Care[\LINK].

[LINK=UNIT_DOCTOR]Renowned Medics[\LINK] are most proficient in this profession. Health production can further be increased through building a [LINK=BUILDING_VILLAGE_WELL]Village Well[\LINK], or upgrading this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_HOSPITAL]Town Hospital[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_HEALTH]Health and Medical Care[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Je mehr Menschen in einer Kolonie leben, desto eher besteht die Gefahr von Krankheiten und Seuchen. Eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arztpraxis[COLOR_REVERT] fördert die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gesundheit[COLOR_REVERT] der Bevölkerung einer Kolonie.
TEXT.Italian: The bigger the population of a city gets the higher the risk of diseases spreading and the more waste and polution. This will negative affect the health and productivity of the citizens. To counter that effect medical care needs to be provided. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Medical Offices[COLOR_REVERT] are the basic level of buildings to allow citizens to work as [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Healers[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Renowned Medics[COLOR_REVERT] are most proficient in this profession.

Ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]großes Krankenhaus[COLOR_REVERT], dass eine Stadt versorgen kann, fördert die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gesundheit[COLOR_REVERT] der Bevölkerung einer Kolonie besser als ein [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]kleines örtliches Krankenhaus[COLOR_REVERT] oder eine einfache [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Arztpraxis[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Renowned Medics[COLOR_REVERT] are most proficient in taking up the [LINK=PROFESSION_HEALER]Healer[\LINK] profession. They generate double the amount of [LINK=YIELD_HEALTH]Health[\LINK] that a normal colonist would.[PARAGRAPH:1]Renowned Medics can be recruited in [LINK=CONCEPT_EUROPE]Europe[\LINK], and they can also be [LINK=CONCEPT_TRAINING]Trained[\LINK] in a colony with a [LINK=BUILDING_UNIVERSITY]University[\LINK] or one of its upgrades.

TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ärzte[COLOR_REVERT] steigern die Gesundheit der Bevölkerung, wenn sie sich in einer Arztpraxis oder einem Krankenhaus aufhalten. Je mehr ausgebildete Ärzte in einer Kolonie leben, desto stärker wirkt sich dies auf den [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]allgemeinen Gesundheitszustand[COLOR_REVERT] der gesamten Bevölkerung aus. Dies steigert die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Geburtenrate, die Produktivität und die Heilung in der Kolonie stationierter Truppen[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: The bigger the populations of a city gets the higher the risk of diseases spreading and the more waste and polution. This will negative affect the health and productivity of the citizens. To counter that effect medical care needs to be provided. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Healers[COLOR_REVERT] need to be employed in [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Medical Offices, Town Hospitals or City Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Renowned Medics[COLOR_REVERT] are most proficient in this profession. With enough medical care, health of a city can even be improved above average and thus even increase productivity and population growth.

TEXT.English: Fresh water is essential for heathiness of human beings. [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Village Wells[COLOR_REVERT] are a good source of such fresh water. Thus they will increase the [LINK=YIELD_HEALTH]Health[\LINK] of your citizens which will positively affect productivity and population growth.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_HEALTH]Health and Medical Care[\LINK].

TEXT.German: Frisches Wasser ist essentiell für die Gesundheit der Menschen. Dorfbrunnen sind eine gute Quelle für dieses frische Wasser und verbessern daher die Gesundheit der Bevölkerung. Dies wiederum beeinflusst die Produktivität und das Bevölkerungswachstum positiv.
TEXT.Italian: Fresh water is essential for heathiness of human beings. Village Wells are a good source of such fresh water. Thus they will increase health of your citizens which will positively affect productivity and population growth.

TEXT.English: After basic shelter, the chapel, and later the church, was likely the most important building of any colony. Spanish and English colonists in particular carried with them significant religious fervor. Catholic monks traveling abroad in the name of God and country helped create many of New Spain's most important institutions, including numerous monasteries, cathedrals and the New World's first university. In the English colonies, Puritans, Quakers, and Catholics alike started new lives in order to worship in peace, bringing with them all shapes of new religious buildings.
TEXT.French: After basic shelter, the chapel, and later the church, was likely the most important building of any colony. Spanish and English colonists in particular carried with them significant religious fervor. Catholic monks traveling abroad in the name of God and country helped create many of New Spain's most important institutions, including numerous monasteries, cathedrals and the New World's first university. In the English colonies, Puritans, Quakers, and Catholics alike started new lives in order to worship in peace, bringing with them all shapes of new religious buildings.
TEXT.German: Nach der einfachen Unterkunft war die Kapelle, und später die Kirche, vermutlich das wichtigste Gebäude jeder Kolonie. Insbesondere spanische und englische Kolonisten brachten einen besonders großen religiösen Eifer mit sich. Katholische Mönche reisten im Namen Gottes und des Landes nach Übersee und erschufen viele der wichtigsten Institutionen Neuspaniens, einschließlich zahlreicher Klöster, Kathedralen und die erste Universität der Neuen Welt. In den englischen Kolonien begannen Puritaner, Quäker und Katholiken gleichermaßen ein neues Leben, um in Frieden ihrem Glauben nachgehen zu können. Und mit ihnen kamen alle möglichen Formen religiöser Gebäude.
TEXT.Italian: LA cappella, e poi la chiesa, dopo la casa, era probabilmente l'edificio più importante di ogni colonia. In particolare i coloni spagnoli e inglesi erano ferventi religiosi. I monaci cattolici, che viaggiavano in lungo e in largo in nome di Dio e della patria, aiutarono nella creazione di molti tra i più importanti insediamenti della Nuova Spagna, tra cui numerosi monasteri, cattedrali e la prima università del Nuovo Mondo. Nelle colonie inglesi puritani, quaccheri e cattolici iniziarono nuove vite per poter praticare in pace la propria fede, portando con sé diversi tipi di edifici religiosi.
TEXT.Spanish: Después de las viviendas, una capilla, y más tarde una iglesia, era posiblemente el edificio más importante de cualquier colonia. Los colonos españoles e ingleses en particular llevaron consigo un importante fervor religioso. Los frailes católicos que cruzaron el océano en nombre de Dios y su patria ayudaron a crear algunas de las instituciones más importantes de Nueva España, incluyendo numerosos Monasterios, Catedrales y la primera Universidad del Nuevo Mundo. En las colonias inglesas, puritanos cuáqueros y católicos por igual empezaron una nueva vida en la que poder practicar su fe en paz, y llevaron consigo nuevos edificios religiosos de todas formas y tamaños.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chapels[COLOR_REVERT] are the base cross-producing building. Assigning a Colonist to work here as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PREACHER]Preacher[\LINK] will generate only a few [LINK=YIELD_CROSSES]Crosses[\LINK] per turn for your settlement. This amount can be increased by assigning a [LINK=UNIT_PREACHER]Firebrand Preacher[\LINK], a [LINK=PRIEST]Devout Priest[\LINK], or even better than those, a [LINK=UNIT_BISHOP]Bishop[\LINK] to work in your [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] or by upgrading to a [LINK=BUILDING_CHURCH]Church[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Crosses, see [LINK=CONCEPT_IMMIGRATION]Immigration[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chapels[COLOR_REVERT] are the base cross-producing building. Assigning a Colonist to work here as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PREACHER]Preacher[\LINK] will generate only a few [LINK=YIELD_CROSSES]Crosses[\LINK] per turn for your settlement. This amount can be increased by assigning a [LINK=UNIT_PREACHER]Firebrand Preacher[\LINK], a [LINK=PRIEST]Devout Priest[\LINK], or even better than those, a [LINK=UNIT_BISHOP]Bishop[\LINK] to work in your [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chapel[COLOR_REVERT] or by upgrading to a [LINK=BUILDING_CHURCH]Church[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about Crosses, see [LINK=CONCEPT_IMMIGRATION]Immigration[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Viele Europäer sind in die Neue Welt ausgewandert, weil sie hofften, dort ungehindert ihre religiöse Überzeugung entfalten zu können. Dieses historische Motiv wird durch das Spielfeature der Kreuze nachgebildet.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jeweils ein Kreuz entsteht pro Spielrunde automatisch in jeder Siedlung. Baut man eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kapelle[COLOR_REVERT] und teilt ihr ein bis ein Bürger im Beruf des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Predigers[COLOR_REVERT] zu, entstehen zusätzliche Kreuze. Baut man anschließend eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kirche[COLOR_REVERT], entstehen doppelt so viele Kreuze pro predigendem Bürger. Setzt man statt eines einfachen Bürgers einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mitreißenden Prediger[COLOR_REVERT] oder einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frommer Priester[COLOR_REVERT] ein, verdoppelt dies ebenfalls die Zahl der entstehenden Kreuze. Schuldknechte, Konvertierte Ureinwohner und Kleinkriminelle erzeugen dagegen weniger Kreuze.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Im Europabildschirm kann man ablesen, wieviele Kreuze bislang zusammengekommen sind. Dabei werden die Kreuze aller Siedlungen addiert. Ist eine bestimmte Zahl von Kreuzen erreicht, hat man einen Europäer davon überzeugt, sein Heil in der Neuen Welt zu suchen. Er steht dann in Europa zur Überfahrt bereit. Mit jedem neuen Emigranten steigt die Zahl der Kreuze, die man gespart haben muss, um einen weiteren Auswanderer zu gewinnen.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Im Europabildschirm sind immer drei potentielle Emigranten zu sehen. Wird ein neuer Auswanderer freigeschaltet, wird er zufällig aus ihrem Kreis bestimmt. Durch Zahlung einer Geldprämie kann man die Freischaltung beschleunigen und dabei auch gezielt eine der drei Einheiten auswählen. Die Höhe dieser Geldprämie hängt davon ab, wieviele Kreuze noch fehlen.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cappelle[COLOR_REVERT] sono l'edificio base per la produzione di croci. Se mandi un libero colono a lavorarci, produrrai due [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]croci[COLOR_REVERT] per turno per il tuo insediamento. Puoi aumentare questo numero mandando un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]predicatore fanatico[COLOR_REVERT] o un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Devout Priest[COLOR_REVERT] a lavorare nella tua [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cappella[COLOR_REVERT], oppure costruendo una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]chiesa[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Capilla[COLOR_REVERT] es el edificio básico de producción de Cruces. Poner a un Colono libre a trabajar aquí; generará dos [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cruces[COLOR_REVERT] por turno para el asentamiento. Esta cantidad puede aumentarse asignando a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Predicador exaltado[COLOR_REVERT] o un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Devout Priest[COLOR_REVERT] a trabajar en la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Capilla[COLOR_REVERT] o construyendo una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iglesia[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: An abbey has historically been a Catholic or, more recently, Anglican, monastery or convent, under the authority of an Abbot or an Abbess, who serves as the spiritual father or mother of the community. [PARAGRAPH:1] The Abbey is not necessarily a place of monastic enclosure. In cities, Abbeys often offers worship services to the citizen community of Christians with the Abbot giving office, thus also serving as a church. As a monastic building though, the Abbey hosts more religious personnel than a simple church, generally monks or nuns. [PARAGRAPH:1] In the New World, Catholic monks traveling abroad in the name of God and country helped create many of New Spain's most important institutions, including numerous monasteries, cathedrals and the New World's first university.

[PARAGRAPH:1] The Abbey is not necessarily a place of monastic enclosure. In cities, Abbeys often offers worship services to the citizen community of Christians with the Abbot giving office, thus also serving as a church. As a monastic building though, the Abbey hosts more religious personnel than a simple church, generally monks or nuns. [PARAGRAPH:1] In the New World, Catholic monks traveling abroad in the name of God and country helped create many of New Spain's most important institutions, including numerous monasteries, cathedrals and the New World's first university.
TEXT.German: Eine Abtei war historisch gesehen ein katholisches oder später auch anglikanisches Kloser oder ein Konvent, geführt durch die Authorität eines Abtes, der als geistlicher Vater der Gemeinde diente. [PARAGRAPH:1] Eine Abtei ist jedoch nicht zwingend ein Ort mönchische Abkehr. In Gemeinden bieten Abteien oft geistliche Dienstleistungen für die ansässige christliche Gemeinde und dient somit als Kirche. [PARAGRAPH:1] In der Neuen Welt, vorallem in Neu Spanien, halfen katholsiche Mönche dabei viele der wichtigsten Institutionen zu errichten. Darunter zahlreiche Klöster, Kathedralen und die erste Universität der neuen Welt.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbeys[COLOR_REVERT] are the third level cross-producing building. Assigning a Colonist to work here as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PREACHER]Preacher[\LINK] will make them produce more [LINK=YIELD_CROSSES]Crosses[\LINK] per turn for your settlement than they would in a [LINK=BUILDING_CHURCH]Church[\LINK]. This amount can be increased by assigning a [LINK=UNIT_PREACHER]Firebrand Preacher[\LINK], a [LINK=PRIEST]Devout Priest[\LINK], or even better than those, a [LINK=UNIT_BISHOP]Bishop[\LINK] to work in your [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbey[COLOR_REVERT] or by upgrading this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_CATHEDRAL]Cathedral[\LINK].

This amount can be increased by assigning a [LINK=UNIT_PREACHER]Firebrand Preacher[\LINK], a [LINK=PRIEST]Devout Priest[\LINK], or even better than those, a [LINK=UNIT_BISHOP]Bishop[\LINK] to work in your [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abbey[COLOR_REVERT] or by upgrading this building to a [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_CATHEDRAL]Cathedral[\LINK].
TEXT.German: Viele Europäer sind in die Neue Welt ausgewandert, weil sie hofften, dort ungehindert ihre religiöse Überzeugung entfalten zu können. Dieses historische Motiv wird durch das Spielfeature der Kreuze nachgebildet.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Jeweils ein Kreuz entsteht pro Spielrunde automatisch in jeder Siedlung. Baut man eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abtei[COLOR_REVERT] und teilt ihr ein bis zwei Bürger im Beruf des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Predigers[COLOR_REVERT] zu, entstehen zusätzliche Kreuze. Baut man anschließend eine [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kathedrale[COLOR_REVERT], entstehen doppelt so viele Kreuze pro predigendem Bürger. Setzt man statt eines einfachen Bürgers einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mitreißenden Prediger[COLOR_REVERT] oder einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frommer Priester[COLOR_REVERT] ein, verdoppelt dies ebenfalls die Zahl der entstehenden Kreuze. Schuldknechte, Konvertierte Ureinwohner und Kleinkriminelle erzeugen dagegen weniger Kreuze.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Im Europabildschirm kann man ablesen, wieviele Kreuze bislang zusammengekommen sind. Dabei werden die Kreuze aller Siedlungen addiert. Ist eine bestimmte Zahl von Kreuzen erreicht, hat man einen Europäer davon überzeugt, sein Heil in der Neuen Welt zu suchen. Er steht dann in Europa zur Überfahrt bereit. Mit jedem neuen Emigranten steigt die Zahl der Kreuze, die man gespart haben muss, um einen weiteren Auswanderer zu gewinnen.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Im Europabildschirm sind immer drei potentielle Emigranten zu sehen. Wird ein neuer Auswanderer freigeschaltet, wird er zufällig aus ihrem Kreis bestimmt. Durch Zahlung einer Geldprämie kann man die Freischaltung beschleunigen und dabei auch gezielt eine der drei Einheiten auswählen. Die Höhe dieser Geldprämie hängt davon ab, wieviele Kreuze noch fehlen.
TEXT.Italian: Le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]abbazie[COLOR_REVERT] sono l'edificio di terzo livello per la produzione di croci. Se mandi un libero colono a lavorarci, produrrai sei [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]croci[COLOR_REVERT] per turno per il tuo insediamento. Puoi aumentare questo numero mandando un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]predicatore fanatico[COLOR_REVERT] o un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Devout Priest[COLOR_REVERT] a lavorare nella tua [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]abbazia[COLOR_REVERT], oppure costruendo una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]cattedrale[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abadía[COLOR_REVERT] es el edificio de tercer nivel de producción de Cruces. Poner a un Colono libre a trabajar aquí; generará seis [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cruces[COLOR_REVERT] por turno para el asentamiento. Esta cantidad puede aumentarse asignando a un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Predicador exaltado[COLOR_REVERT] o un [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Devout Priest[COLOR_REVERT] a trabajar en la [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Abadía[COLOR_REVERT] o construyendo una [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catedral[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Cathedrals are enormous Catholic churches that usually denote the seat of an archbishop. In Colonization, Cathedrals simply represent a major seat of religious power, regardless of denomination. [PARAGRAPH:1]The earliest Cathedrals in the New World were built in the colonies of the Spanish and Portuguese. Construction of the West's first cathedral began in 1514, commissioned by Columbus himself on the island of Santo Domingo. The island's Cathedral was completed in 1540, and would become the first among many. North America, because of its largely Protestant population, did not build its first cathedral, the Baltimore Basilica, until 1806. In the 20th century, however, some of the largest cathedrals on Earth would be built in North America, including Saint Joseph's Oratory in Quebec and the Cathedral of St. John in New York.

In Colonization, Cathedrals simply represent a major seat of religious power, regardless of denomination. [PARAGRAPH:1]The earliest Cathedrals in the New World were built in the colonies of the Spanish and Portuguese. Construction of the West's first cathedral began in 1514, commissioned by Columbus himself on the island of Santo Domingo. The island's Cathedral was completed in 1540, and would become the first among many. North America, because of its largely Protestant population, did not build its first cathedral, the Baltimore Basilica, until 1806. In the 20th century, however, some of the largest cathedrals on Earth would be built in North America, including Saint Joseph's Oratory in Quebec and the Cathedral of St. John in New York.
TEXT.German: Kathedralen sind enorme katholische Kirchen, die für gewöhnlich den Sitz des Erzbischofs markierten. In Colonization stellen Kathedralen einfach einen großen Sitz einer religiösen Macht dar, unabhängig von der Konfession.[PARAGRAPH:1]Die frühesten Kathedralen der Neuen Welt wurden in den Kolonien Spaniens und Portugals errichtet. Der Bau der ersten westlichen Kathedrale begann 1514 und wurde von Columbus selbst auf der Insel Santo Domingo in Auftrag gegeben. Die Kathedrale der Insel wurde 1540 fertiggestellt und sollte die erste von vielen sein. Nordamerika baute durch den hohen Anteil an Protestanten innerhalb der Bevölkerung mit der Basilika von Baltimore die erste Kathedrale erst 1806, doch im 20. Jahrhundert wurden einige der größten Kathedralen der Welt in Nordamerika gebaut, einschließlich der Saint-Joseph-Kathedrale in Québec und die Kathedrale St. John in New York.
TEXT.Italian: Le cattedrali sono enormi chiese cattoliche, di solito sede di un arcivescovado. In Colonization le cattedrali rappresentano semplicemente un'importante sede di potere religioso, a prescindere dalla confessione. [PARAGRAPH:1]Le prime cattedrali del Nuovo Mondo furono costruite nelle colonie spagnole e portoghesi. La costruzione della prima cattedrale dell'ovest cominciò nel 1514, e fu ordinata dallo stesso Colombo sull'isola di Santo Domingo. Venne completata nel 1540 e sarebbe diventata la prima di molte. Il Nord America, a causa della popolazione in gran parte protestante, non costruì la prima cattedrale (la Basilica di Baltimora) fino al 1806. Nel XX secolo, però, in Nord America vennero costruite alcune tra le più grandi cattedrali della Terra, tra cui l'Oratorio di St. Joseph nel Quebec e la Cattedrale of St. John a New York.
TEXT.Spanish: Las Catedrales son grandes templos católicos en los que se suele ubicar la sede de un arzobispo. En Colonization, las Catedrales representan cualquier sede importante de un poder religioso, sea cual sea su denominación en concreto. [PARAGRAPH:1]Las primeras Catedrales del Nuevo Mundo se construyeron en las colonias españolas y portuguesas. La construcción de la primera Catedral del oeste se empezó en 1514 en la isla de Santo Domingo, por encargo del propio Colón. La Catedral de la isla se completó en 1540 y se convertiría en la primera de muchas. América del Norte, a causa de su población mayoritariamente protestante, no construiría su primera Catedral, la basílica de Baltimore, hasta 1806. No obstante, en el s. XX, algunas de las catedrales más grandes de la Tierra se construirían en Norteamérica, incluyendo el oratorio de San José, en Quebec, y la catedral de San Juan, en Nueva York.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral of the Archbishop[COLOR_REVERT] replaces the [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_CATHEDRAL]Cathedral[\LINK], and is the ultimate source of [LINK=YIELD_CROSSES]Crosses[\LINK]. As a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT], it can only be built once in all of your colonies. Once you've built enough Cathedrals in your Colonial Empire, the Cathedral of the Archbishop can be built as an upgrade of an existing cathedral in a city which already owns a [LINK=BUILDING_PALACE]Government Palace[\LINK]. A colonist working as a [LINK=PROFESSION_PREACHER]Preacher[\LINK] within this place of worship will produce even more [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crosses[COLOR_REVERT] per turn than they would in a regular Cathedral, and this building can support more Preachers at the same time. Assigning a [LINK=UNIT_PREACHER]Firebrand Preacher[\LINK], a [LINK=PRIEST]Devout Priest[\LINK], or even better than those, a [LINK=UNIT_BISHOP]Bishop[\LINK], will further increase your settlement's cross output.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral of the Archbishop[COLOR_REVERT] replaces the [LINK=BUILDING_GREAT_CATHEDRAL]Cathedral[\LINK], and is the ultimate source of [LINK=YIELD_CROSSES]Crosses[\LINK]. As a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT], it can only be built once in all of your colonies. TEXT.German: Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kathedrale des Erzbischofs[COLOR_REVERT] ist die ultimative Quelle für [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kreuze[COLOR_REVERT]. Als ein [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nationales Wunder[COLOR_REVERT] kann sie nur ein einziges Mal in allen euren Kolonien errichtet werden. Sobald ihr genug [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kathedralen[COLOR_REVERT] in eurem Kolonialreich errichtet habt, kann als Upgrade einer dieser errichtet werden, wenn die Stadt auch einen [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Regierungspalast[COLOR_REVERT] hat. Ein Kolonist der dort als Priester arbeitet, erzeugt sehr viele [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Kreuze[COLOR_REVERT] pro Runde. Wird ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hetzprediger[COLOR_REVERT], ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frommer Priester[COLOR_REVERT] oder gar ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bischof[COLOR_REVERT] zugewiesen, ist der Ausstoss an Kreuzen noch deutlich höher.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral of the Archbishop[COLOR_REVERT] is the ultimate source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crosses[COLOR_REVERT]. As a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National wonder[COLOR_REVERT], it can only be built once in all of your colonies. Once you've built enough cathedrals in your colonial Empire, the cathedral of the Archbishop can be built as an upgrade of an existing cathedral in a city which already owns a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Government Palace[COLOR_REVERT]. A colonist working within this place of worship will produce eight [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crosses[COLOR_REVERT] per turn. Assigning a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Firebrand Preacher[COLOR_REVERT], a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Devout Priest[COLOR_REVERT], or even better than that, a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bishop[COLOR_REVERT], will further increase your settlement's cross output.

TEXT.English: The productive capabilities of the New World were a shock to many. By the tail end of the 1700s, colonies in the New World had become leaders in the production of cotton, rum, sugar, tobacco and gold. In response to the explosion of commerce, new infrastructure was continually being built in the New World's major port cities. Philadelphia, Havana, Boston, New Amsterdam all were littered with warehouses built to protect the new wealth of the colonies.
TEXT.French: The productive capabilities of the New World were a shock to many. By the tail end of the 1700s, colonies in the New World had become leaders in the production of cotton, rum, sugar, tobacco and gold. In response to the explosion of commerce, new infrastructure was continually being built in the New World's major port cities. Philadelphia, Havana, Boston, New Amsterdam all were littered with warehouses built to protect the new wealth of the colonies.
TEXT.German: Das Produktionspotenzial der Neuen Welt war für viele ein Schock. Gegen Ende des 18. Jahrhunderts waren die Kolonien der Neuen Welt die führenden Produzenten von Baumwolle, Rum, Zucker, Tabak und Gold geworden. Als Reaktion auf den explodierenden Handel wurde die Infrastruktur in den wichtigsten Hafenstädten der Neuen Welt immer weiter ausgebaut. Philadelphia, Havanna, Boston und Neu-Amsterdam waren übersät mit Lagergebäuden, um den neuen Wohlstand der Kolonien zu schützen.
TEXT.Italian: Le potenzialità produttive del Nuovo Mondo furono per molti uno shock. Alla fine del XVIII secolo le colonie del Nuovo Mondo erano in testa alla produzione di cotone, rum, zucchero, tabacco e oro. Come conseguenza dell'esplosione del commercio, venivano continuamente costruite nuove infrastrutture nelle maggiori città portuali del Nuovo Mondo. Filadelfia, Avana, Boston, New Amsterdam: si riempirono tutte di magazzini, costruiti per proteggere la nuova ricchezza delle colonie.
TEXT.Spanish: La capacidad de producción del Nuevo Mundo fue una gran sorpresa para mucha gente. A finales del s. XVIII, las colonias del Nuevo Mundo se habían convertido en líderes de la producción de Algodón, Ron, Azúcar, Tabaco y Oro. En respuesta a este auge comercial, se tenían que construir nuevas infraestructuras continuamente en las ciudades portuarias más importantes del Nuevo Mundo. Filadelfia, La Habana, Boston, Nueva Ámsterdam... todas estaban repletas de Almacenes levantados para proteger la nueva riqueza de las colonias.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Warehouse Expansion[COLOR_REVERT] is the third-level facility to increase the storage capacity of your colony. Surplus are sold at 60% of their selling price in Europe. As a roasting place, colonists working there can take on the [LINK=PROFESSION_COCOA_DRIER]Cocoa Drier[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_DRIER]Coffee Drier[\LINK] profession and process [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK]. The [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] is adept at both of these professions. You need to build a [LINK=BUILDING_CUSTOM_HOUSE]Custom House[\LINK] in order to further increase your capacities.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_NEW_STORAGE]City Storage[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Warehouse Expansion[COLOR_REVERT] is the third-level facility to increase the storage capacity of your colony. TEXT.German: In einer neu gegründeten Siedlung kann nur eine bestimmte Menge an Waren gelagert werden. Gibt es am Anfang einer Runde einen Warenüberschuss, wird die Hälfte davon vernichtet. Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lagerhaus[COLOR_REVERT] und dessen Ausbaustufen erweitert diese Kapazität. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lagerhauserweiterung[COLOR_REVERT] verkauft zudem automatisch in jeder Runde immer den Teil des Überschusses, der sonst vernichtet würde, zu 50 Prozent des üblichen Verkaufspreises nach Europa. Die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grosse Lagerhauserweiterung[COLOR_REVERT] steigert den Erlös auf 60 Prozent. Das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zollhaus[COLOR_REVERT] steigert den Erlös sogar nochmals auf 80 Prozent des normalen Verkaufspreises. Selbstverständlich sind alle Waren, die einem Boykott unterliegen, ausgenommen, und auch der aktuelle Steuersatz muss weiter entrichtet werden. Bei einem automatischen Verkauf werden - im Vergleich zum Verkauf im Europahafen - weniger Handels-Gründerväterpunkte erzeugt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ausgenommen ist die Nahrung, für die es keine Lagergrenze gibt. Steigt der Nahrungsbestand einer Kolonie am Ende einer Runde über 200, fällt er in der nächsten Runde wieder auf null, und in der Siedlung entsteht ein zusätzlicher Freier Kolonist.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Warehouse expansion[COLOR_REVERT] is the third-level facility to increase the storage capacity of your colony. Surplus are sold at 60% of their selling price in Europe. As a roasting place, colonists working there can process [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cocoa pods[COLOR_REVERT] into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee berries[COLOR_REVERT] into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT]. You need to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Custom House[COLOR_REVERT] in order to further increase your capacities.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Customs Authority[COLOR_REVERT] functions as an upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_CUSTOM_HOUSE]Custom House[\LINK], increases a settlement's [LINK=CONCEPT_NEW_STORAGE]Storage Capacity[\LINK], and allows you to sell surplus at 90% of their selling price in Europe, even for boycotted goods. You can manage the Central Customs Authority through the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Custom House Screen[COLOR_REVERT] of the settlement, where you can allow or disallow the Custom House to sell a certain good, and determine the minimum quantity of each good under which it will not be sold. As a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT], you can build only one in all of your colonies, once you've built enough Custom Houses.[NEWLINE]As a roasting place, colonists working there can take on the [LINK=PROFESSION_COCOA_DRIER]Cocoa Drier[\LINK] or [LINK=PROFESSION_COFFEE_DRIER]Coffee Drier[\LINK] profession and process [LINK=YIELD_COCOA_FRUITS]Cocoa Pods[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_COCOA]Cocoa[\LINK] or [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE_BERRIES]Coffee Berries[\LINK] into [LINK=YIELD_COFFEE]Coffee[\LINK]. The [LINK=UNIT_FERMENTATOR]Master Drier[\LINK] is adept at both of these professions.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about storage capacity, see [LINK=CONCEPT_NEW_STORAGE]City Storage[\LINK]. For more information about Custom Houses, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].

TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Customs Authority[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to sell surplus at 90% of their selling price in Europe, even for boycotted goods. As a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National wonder[COLOR_REVERT], you can build only one in all of your colonies, once you've built enough Custom Houses. As a roasting place, colonists working there can process [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cocoa pods[COLOR_REVERT] into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cocoa[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee berries[COLOR_REVERT] into [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: The English colonial city of Boston became a hotbed for the creation of America's earliest newspapers. "Publick Occurrences Both Forreign and Domestick" published by Benjamin Harris, the New World's first newspaper, was also one of its least successful, and lasted only four days before being shut down for speaking ill of royal soldiers stationed in Boston. Several years later, a new paper, one far more interested in the political and social life of England than in the colonies, entered into circulation around Boston. This paper, "The Boston News-Letter" riled the city's colonial masters far less and ran successfully for decades.
TEXT.French: The English colonial city of Boston became a hotbed for the creation of America's earliest newspapers. "Publick Occurrences Both Forreign and Domestick" published by Benjamin Harris, the New World's first newspaper, was also one of its least successful, and lasted only four days before being shut down for speaking ill of royal soldiers stationed in Boston. Several years later, a new paper, one far more interested in the political and social life of England than in the colonies, entered into circulation around Boston. This paper, "The Boston News-Letter" riled the city's colonial masters far less and ran successfully for decades.
TEXT.German: Die englische Kolonialstadt Boston wurde zu einer Vorreiterin bei der Gründung der frühesten amerikanischen Zeitungen. Die Publikation "Publick Occurences Both Forreign and Domestick", herausgegeben von Benjamin Harris, war die erste Zeitung der Neuen Welt und gleichzeitig die erfolgloseste. Sie wurde nur vier Tage lang herausgebracht, bevor sie wegen negativer Aussagen gegen die in Boston stationierten englischen Soldaten eingestellt wurde. Einige Jahre später erschien in Boston eine neue Zeitung, die sich wesentlich mehr für das politische und soziale Leben in den Kolonien als das in England interessierte. Diese Zeitung, der "Boston News-Letter", verärgerte die Kolonialherren der Stadt weit weniger und wurde jahrzehntelang erfolgreich herausgegeben.
TEXT.Italian: La città coloniale inglese di Boston divenne terreno fertile per la creazione dei primi quotidiani americani. "Publick Occurrences Both Forreign and Domestick" (Avvenimenti pubblici nazionali ed esteri), pubblicato da Benjamin Harris, fu il primo quotidiano del Nuovo Mondo e anche quello che ebbe meno successo: durò solo quattro giorni, prima di venire chiuso per aver parlato male di soldati reali di stanza a Boston. Molti anni più tardi un nuovo giornale, molto più interessato alla vita politica e sociale dell'Inghilterra che a quella delle colonie, venne distribuito a Boston. Questo quotidiano, il "The Boston News-Letter", infastidì molto meno i padroni coloniali della città e venne pubblicato con successo per decenni.
TEXT.Spanish: La ciudad colonial inglesa de Boston se convirtió en la cuna de los primeros Periódicos de América. El "Publick Occurrences Both Forreign and Domestick" publicado por Benjamin Harris, el primer Periódico del Nuevo Mundo, también fue uno de los que tuvo una vida más corta, ya que solo duró cuatro días hasta que fue clausurado por hablar mal de los soldados reales acantonados en Boston. Varios años después, un nuevo diario, mucho más interesado en la vida política y social de Inglaterra que en la de las colonias, empezó a circular por Boston. Dicho diario, el "Boston News-Letter", irritó mucho menos a los amos de la ciudad colonial y se publicó durante décadas.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Colonial Publisher[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT] that is an upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_NEWSPAPER]Newspaper[\LINK]. It boosts the production of [LINK=YIELD_BELLS]Liberty Bells[\LINK] in your settlement even more than the Newspaper does. They are the key to drawing [LINK=CONCEPT_FATHERS]Founding Fathers[\LINK] to your side and generating enough Rebel Sentiment to start a [LINK=CONCEPT_INDEPENDENCE_WAR]revolution[\LINK].[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_REBEL_SENTIMENT]Rebel Sentiment[\LINK].

TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Druckerpressen[COLOR_REVERT] können zu [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zeitungen[COLOR_REVERT] aufgewertet werden, die einen noch höheren Bonus auf die Zahl der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Freiheitsglocken[COLOR_REVERT] geben, die in der Siedlung erzeugt werden. Dieser Effekt wird erzielt, ohne dass Bürger in diesem Gebäude arbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: I [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]giornali[COLOR_REVERT] sono tra le migliori fonti di [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]campane della libertà[COLOR_REVERT] del gioco. Sono fondamentali per portare dalla tua parte i Padri Fondatori e generare abbastanza sentimento ribelle da dichiarare l'indipendenza dall'Europa.
TEXT.Spanish: Los [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Periódicos[COLOR_REVERT] se cuentan entre las mejores fuentes de [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Campanas de la libertad[COLOR_REVERT] del juego. Son la clave para atraer a vuestro bando a los Padres fundadores y generar suficiente Sentimiento de rebelión para declararse independientes de Europa.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The purpose of whaling was largely to collect blubber. This was rendered into oil in try pots, or later, in vats on factory ships. The oil could be then used in the manufacture of soap, leather, and cosmetics. Whale oil was used in candles as wax, and rendered into oil for use in lamps as fuel. Blue whales can yield blubber harvests of up to 50 tons.

TEXT.German: [TAB]Im 17. Jahrhunderts begannen die europäischen Kolonisten in Nordamerika, mit Kuttern und Harpunen Jagd auf die Walschulen zu machen, die an der Nordostküste der Neuen Welt beheimatet waren. Tran, ist ein aus dem Fettgewebe von Walen und Robben, dem so genannten Blubber, durch Erhitzen, Auspressen, Ausschmelzen oder einfaches Ausklopfen gewonnenes Öl. Der durch Kochen zerstückelten Walspecks gewonnene Waltran wurde bis Anfang des 20. Jh. als Lampenöl benutzt; er war der erste in großen Mengen verfügbare flüssige Brennstoff und seine Gewinnung war die wirtschaftliche Hauptantriebskraft des Walfangs. Dieser wurde vor allem im 17. und 18. Jahrhundert in sehr großem Stil inbesondere von Seefahrern aus England und den Niederlanden betrieben.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Train Oil Rendering Plant[COLOR_REVERT] is the only upgrade available to the [LINK=BUILDING_WHALE_OIL_HOUSE]Train Oil Manufactory[\LINK]. Inside, you can employ colonists as [LINK=PROFESSION_WHALE_OIL_COOKER]Train Oil Cookers[\LINK] to turn [LINK=YIELD_WHALE_BLUBBER]Whale Fat[\LINK], which you can receive from a [LINK=UNIT_WHALING_BOAT]Whaling Boat[\LINK], into more valuable [LINK=YIELD_WHALE_OIL]Train Oil[\LINK]. If ordering a this profession to a [LINK=UNIT_WHALE_OIL_COOKER]Master Train Oil Cooker[\LINK] the amount of produced Train Oil will be increased by 100%, if enough Whale Fat is in stock.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_WHALING]Whaling and Fishing[\LINK].

TEXT.German: [TAB]In Küstenstädten kann die [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trankocherei[COLOR_REVERT] errichtet werden, in ihr wird nach erfolgreichem Walfang der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Walspeck[COLOR_REVERT] zu wertvollem [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tran[COLOR_REVERT] verarbeitet. Wenn zum Beispiel ein Freier Kolonist hier im Beruf des Trankochers arbeitet, kann die Trankocherei pro Runde drei Einheiten Walspeck in drei Einheiten Tran umwandeln. Die Beschäftigung von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Meistertrankochern[COLOR_REVERT] verdoppelt die Produktion von Tran und den Verbrauch des Rohstoffes Walspeck. Baut man die Trankocherei zu einer [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tranfabrik[COLOR_REVERT] aus, kann dort noch mehr Tran gewonnen werden.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Ist weniger Rohstoff im Lager, als man braucht, wird entsprechend weniger von der Fertigware produziert. Ist mehr Rohstoff im Lager, als verarbeitet werden kann, bleibt der Rest im Lager.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB]In coastal cities a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Train Oil Manufacture[COLOR_REVERT] can be build. In it you can turn [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blubber[COLOR_REVERT], that you can receive from a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Whaling Boat[COLOR_REVERT], into more valuable [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Train Oil[COLOR_REVERT]. If ordering a citizen to work in the profession of a Train Oil Cooker in the Train Oil Manufacture, he will turn three Blubber into three [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Train Oil[COLOR_REVERT]. If ordering a this profession to a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Master Train Oil Cooker[COLOR_REVERT] the amount of produces Train Oil will increase by 100%, if enough Blubber is in stock. Upgrading the Train Oil Manufacture to a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Train Oil Factory[COLOR_REVERT] will increase the rate of production from three to five per turn, also you will gain a 40% bonus on the production that will not need additional Blubber.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The colonists of the New World were not only producing and exporting goods to Europe but also consumers. Certain goods that the colonies could not produce themselves, especially luxury goods, were imported and sold for high prices in Markets and Trade-Centers in the colonies. Some of the Shopkeepers and Traders became extremely rich.
TEXT.French: [TAB]The colonists of the New World were not only producing and exporting goods to Europe but also consumers. Certain goods that the colonies could not produce themselves, especially luxury goods, were imported and sold for high prices in Markets and Trade-Centers in the colonies. Some of the Shopkeepers and Traders became extremely rich.
TEXT.German: [TAB]Die Kolonisten der Neuen Welt produzierten und exportierten nicht nur Waren, sondern waren natürlich auch selbst Konsumenten. Bestimmte Waren, die die Kolonien nicht selbst herstellen konnnten, vorallem Luxuswaren, wurden importiert und zu hohen Preisen in auf Märkten, in Läden und in Handelszentren der Kolonien verkauft. Einige der Händler und Ladenbesitzer, die diese Geschäfte betrieben wurden extrem reich.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Town Market[COLOR_REVERT] is the first upgrade of the [LINK=BUILDING_MARKET]Village Market[\LINK]. [LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Luxury Goods[\LINK] and other goods can be sold to your colonists here, and their demand for goods is higher than they would be if only a Village Market were present. The amount that can be sold strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in money. The Town Market can further be upgraded to a [LINK=BUILDING_CENTRAL_CITY_MARKET]Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT], which increases the demand for goods in a city even more.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Town Market[COLOR_REVERT] is the first upgrade of the [LINK=BUILDING_MARKET]Village Market[\LINK]. [LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Luxury Goods[\LINK] and other goods can be sold to your colonists here, and their demand for goods is higher than they would be if only a Village Market were present. The amount that can be sold strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in money. The Town Market can further be upgraded to a [LINK=BUILDING_CENTRAL_CITY_MARKET]Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT], which increases the demand for goods in a city even more.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxusgüter aus Europa[COLOR_REVERT] und andere Waren werden an die anderen Kolonisten verkauft. Die Verkaufsmenge hängt sehr stark von der Anzahl an reichen Bürgern der Stadt ab und wird direkt in Gold (Geld) bezahlt. Ein [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dorfmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] ist notwendig um den Handel innerhalb einer Kolonie zu ermöglichen. Die Ausbaustufen, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Städtischer Markt[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Überregionaler Kolonialmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen die Nachfrage.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Luxury Goods[COLOR_REVERT] and other goods are sold to the colonists. The amount strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in gold. A [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT] is needed to enable the domestic market within a city. The higher levels, [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Market[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Central Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] increase demand for goods in a city.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Regional Market[COLOR_REVERT] is the upgrade of the [LINK=BUILDING_TOWN_MARKET]Town Market[\LINK], and the highest Market building that is available in the game.[LINK=YIELD_LUXURY_GOODS]Luxury Goods[\LINK] and other goods can be sold to your colonists here, and their demand for goods is higher than they would be if only a Village Market or Town Market were present. The amount that can be sold strongly depends on the number of citizens of the City and their social status. They will directly pay in money.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT] is the upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_TAVERN]Tavern[\LINK], and brings even more profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective the Saloon is. The higher levels of the building, the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK] and the National Wonder of the [LINK=BUILDING_OPERA]Grand Opera[\LINK] further increase that effect.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].

For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] erwirtschaften einen Profit durch den Verkauf von Alkohol. Je höher die Kulturrate der Stadt, desto effektiver sind sie. Die Ausbaustufen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Koloniales Opernhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Gewinn durch Kultur.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] is the upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_SALOON]Saloon[\LINK], and brings even more profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective the Theatre is. It is the highest level of entertainment building available, save for the National Wonder of the [LINK=BUILDING_OPERA]Grand Opera[\LINK], which can be built only once.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT] that serves as an upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK], and brings even more profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective the Grand Opera is.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT] that serves as an upgrade to the [LINK=BUILDING_THEATRE]Theatre[\LINK], and brings even more profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists by turning Culture into money. The higher the [LINK=YIELD_CULTURE]Culture[\LINK] rate, the more effective the Grand Opera is.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information about the colonial economy, see [LINK=CONCEPT_DOMESTIC_MARKETS]Domestic Economy[\LINK]. For more information about Culture, see [LINK=CONCEPT_BORDERS]Borders and Culture[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tavernen[COLOR_REVERT] erwirtschaften einen Profit durch den Verkauf von Alkohol. Je höher die Kulturrate der Stadt, desto effektiver sind sie. Die Ausbaustufen [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] und [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Koloniales Opernhaus[COLOR_REVERT] erhöhen den Gewinn durch Kultur.
TEXT.Italian: [TAB][COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taverns[COLOR_REVERT] bring profits by selling alcohol and entertainment to your colonists. The higher the culture rate, the more effective they are. The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

The higher levels of the building, [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Saloon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Theater[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Grand Opera[COLOR_REVERT] increase that effect.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Horse and Cattle Market[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT] that increases the production of [LINK=YIELD_HORSES]Horses[\LINK], [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] in a settlement even more than a [LINK=BUILDING_RANCH]Large Stable[\LINK]. As it is a National Wonder, it can be built only once. Stables will give protection from harsh weathre during storms and cold winters for your livestock. In addition to that, your livestock can give birth in a secure environment.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Breeding Horses, Cattle and Sheep[\LINK].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Horse and Cattle Market[COLOR_REVERT] is a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]National Wonder[COLOR_REVERT] that increases the production of [LINK=YIELD_HORSES]Horses[\LINK], [LINK=YIELD_CATTLE]Cattle[\LINK] and [LINK=YIELD_SHEEP]Sheep[\LINK] in a settlement even more than a [LINK=BUILDING_RANCH]Large Stable[\LINK]. As it is a National Wonder, it can be built only once. Stables will give protection from harsh weathre during storms and cold winters for your livestock. In addition to that, your livestock can give birth in a secure environment.[PARAGRAPH:1]For more information, see [LINK=CONCEPT_CATTLE_OR_SHEEP_BREEDING]Breeding Horses, Cattle and Sheep[\LINK].
TEXT.German: In [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stallungen[COLOR_REVERT] sind Nutztiere vor kaltem Wetter im Winter geschützt und können in sicherer Umgebung ihre Jungtiere zur Welt bringen. Dadurch lassen sich [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Nutztiere[COLOR_REVERT] erfolgreicher züchten. Zur Errichtung der Stallungen und der Ranch wird eine gewisse Zahl von Nutztieren benötigt. Der [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]große Viehmarkt[COLOR_REVERT] ermöglicht eine überregionale Zucht und Vermarktung und steigert die Zucht daher noch einmal zusätzlich.
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] allows increased breeding of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]livestock[COLOR_REVERT]. Stables will give protection from harsh weather during storms and cold winters for your pups. Also your livestock can give birth in secure environment. The [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]grand horse and cattle market[COLOR_REVERT] enables a supraregional trading of livestock and therefore will increase breeding additionally.

TEXT.English: Led by Great Admiral
TEXT.French: Led by Great Admiral
TEXT.German: Angeführt von Großem Admiral
TEXT.Italian: Condotto da un Grande Admirale
TEXT.Spanish: Al mando de un Gran Admiral

TEXT.English: Great Admiral

Before the arrival of the Europeans in the New World, the continents didn't see many naval battles, as there were no advanced civilizations separated from one another by seas, unlike the situation in the Mediterranean, for example, where naval battles have been fought since the Bronze Age.[PARAGRAPH:1]The first battles of this kind in the New World were fought between different European powers, and they mainly took place in the Caribbean. Originally during the era of Spanish dominance in the New World, rival powers resorted to piracy to plunder the treasures as they were being transported to Europe. Later on, as more Colonial Powers became established in the New World, full-scale naval battles became more common, both between colonial powers and between colonies and their mother countries, as in the case of the United States and Britain.[PARAGRAPH:1]During these wars, great strategic minds often emerged to lead these fleets, like Francois Joseph Paul de Grasse, who soundly defeated the British fleet at the Battle of the Chesapeake (1781), a devastating blow to the British Royal Expeditionary Army, and one of the turning points in the war that ultimately led to the independence of the United States.[PARAGRAPH:1]Many pirate captains, who were granted a Letter of Marque by European nations to attack fleets of rival powers, gained fame and notoriety for their tactical insight as well. One of the most famous is Piet Heyn, who captured a Spanish Silver Fleet in 1628, which provided the emerging Dutch Republic with the financial means to continue and ultimately win the Independence War against the Spanish.
TEXT.French: Before the arrival of the Europeans in the New World, the continents didn't see many naval battles, as there were no advanced civilizations separated from one another by seas, unlike the situation in the Mediterranean, for example, where naval battles have been fought since the Bronze Age.[PARAGRAPH:1]The first battles of this kind in the New World were fought between different European powers, and they mainly took place in the Caribbean. Originally during the era of Spanish dominance in the New World, rival powers resorted to piracy to plunder the treasures as they were being transported to Europe. Later on, as more Colonial Powers became established in the New World, full-scale naval battles became more common, both between colonial powers and between colonies and their mother countries, as in the case of the United States and Britain.[PARAGRAPH:1]During these wars, great strategic minds often emerged to lead these fleets, like Francois Joseph Paul de Grasse, who soundly defeated the British fleet at the Battle of the Chesapeake (1781), a devastating blow to the British Royal Expeditionary Army, and one of the turning points in the war that ultimately led to the independence of the United States.[PARAGRAPH:1]Many pirate captains, who were granted a Letter of Marque by European nations to attack fleets of rival powers, gained fame and notoriety for their tactical insight as well. One of the most famous is Piet Heyn, who captured a Spanish Silver Fleet in 1628, which provided the emerging Dutch Republic with the financial means to continue and ultimately win the Independence War against the Spanish.
TEXT.German: Vor der Ankunft der Europäer in der Neuen Welt sahen diese Kontinente nicht viele Seeschlachten. Es gabe einfach keine fortschrittliche nZivilisationen die voneinander durch ein Meer getrennt waren, wie es beispielsweise im Mittelmeerraum der Fall war, wo es seit der Bronzezeit immer wieder zu Seeschlachten kam.[PARAGRAPH:1]Die ersten Kämpfe dieser Art in der Neuen Welt wurden von Eurpäischen Mächten geführt und fanden vorallem in der Karibik statt. Während der Zeit der spanischen Dominanz der Neuen Welt, wanden sich rivalisierende Mächte der Piraterie zu um Schätze zu plündern, die auf dem Weg nach Europa waren. Als sich dann später mehrere Kolonialmächte in der Neuen Welt etabliert hatten, wurden auch gröere Seeschlachten etwas üblicher. Sowohl zwischen zwei Kolonialmächten, wie auch zwischen Kolonien und ihren Mütterländern, wie es beispielsweise im Amerikanischen Unabhängigkeitskrieg der Fall war.[PARAGRAPH:1]Während dieser Kriege erhoben sich oft brilliante Stategen um die Flotten ihres Landes zu führen, wie beispielsweise Francois Joseph Paul de Grasse, der die britischen Flotte in der Schlacht um Chesapeake (1781) besiegte, die einen vernichtenden Schlag gegen die britischen Expeditionsstreitkräfte darstellte und oft auch als Wendepunkt bezeichnet wird, der letztendlich zur Unabhängigkeit der Vereinigten Staaten führte.[PARAGRAPH:1]Viele Piratenkapitäne, denen Kaperbriefe zugestanden wurden um die Flotten rivalisierender Nationen anzugreifen erlangten ebenso Ruhm und Ehre. Einer der berühtesten ist Piet Heyn, der eine spanische Silberflotte im Jahre 1628 kaperte, die es der aufsteigenden Niederländischen Republik erlaubte ihren Unabhängigkeitskrieg gegen Spanien weiter zu finanzieren und letztlich zu gewinnen.
TEXT.Italian: Before the arrival of the Europeans in the New World, the continents didn't see many naval battles, as there were no advanced civilizations separated from one another by seas, unlike the situation in the Mediterranean, for example, where naval battles have been fought since the Bronze Age.[PARAGRAPH:1]The first battles of this kind in the New World were fought between different European powers, and they mainly took place in the Caribbean. Originally during the era of Spanish dominance in the New World, rival powers resorted to piracy to plunder the treasures as they were being transported to Europe. Later on, as more Colonial Powers became established in the New World, full-scale naval battles became more common, both between colonial powers and between colonies and their mother countries, as in the case of the United States and Britain.[PARAGRAPH:1]During these wars, great strategic minds often emerged to lead these fleets, like Francois Joseph Paul de Grasse, who soundly defeated the British fleet at the Battle of the Chesapeake (1781), a devastating blow to the British Royal Expeditionary Army, and one of the turning points in the war that ultimately led to the independence of the United States.[PARAGRAPH:1]Many pirate captains, who were granted a Letter of Marque by European nations to attack fleets of rival powers, gained fame and notoriety for their tactical insight as well. One of the most famous is Piet Heyn, who captured a Spanish Silver Fleet in 1628, which provided the emerging Dutch Republic with the financial means to continue and ultimately win the Independence War against the Spanish.

One of the most famous is Piet Heyn, who captured a Spanish Silver Fleet in 1628, which provided the emerging Dutch Republic with the financial means to continue and ultimately win the Independence War against the Spanish.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Admirals[COLOR_REVERT] are intelligent naval commanders who are in command of large fleets. When attached to a ship, they grant it the [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADER2]Led By Great Admiral[\LINK] promotion, which gives a 25% Combat bonus against all other naval units, as well as access to a few other promotions. It also provides 20 Experience points to all units on the same plot at the moment it is attached to a ship. Once a Great Admiral becomes attached, it stays with that particular ship until the ship is lost, so the unit itself disappears at that point.[PARAGRAPH:1]For information about how Great Admirals work, see [LINK=CONCEPT_GREAT_GENERALS]Great Generals and Admirals[\LINK].
TEXT.French: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Admirals[COLOR_REVERT] are intelligent naval commanders who are in command of large fleets. When attached to a ship, they grant it the [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADER2]Led By Great Admiral[\LINK] promotion, which gives a 25% Combat bonus against all other naval units, as well as access to a few other promotions. It also provides 20 Experience points to all units on the same plot at the moment it is attached to a ship. Once a Great Admiral becomes attached, it stays with that particular ship until the ship is lost, so the unit itself disappears at that point.[PARAGRAPH:1]For information about how Great Admirals work, see [LINK=CONCEPT_GREAT_GENERALS]Great Generals and Admirals[\LINK].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Große Admiräle[COLOR_REVERT] sind fähige Befehlshaber zur See, die größere Flotten kommandieren. Wenn sie sich einem Schiff anschlieen, übertragen sie diesem die Beförderung [LINK=PROMOTION_LEADER2]Angeführt von Großem Admiral[\LINK], welche einen 25% Kampfbonus gegen andere Schiffe gewährt, aber auch weitere Beförderungen freischalten, die diesem Schiff sonst nicht zugänglich wären. Dies liefert auch 20 weitere Erfahrungspunkte, die auf alle Einheiten auf dem selben Feld verteilt werden. Hat sich ein Großer Admiral einem Schiff angeschlossen, so bleibt er bei diesem, bis das Schiff eventuell verloren geht. Die Einheit selbst verschwindet dann also.
